translation.en: I can't believe I cheated on Anemona.
translation.es: No puedo creer que engañé a Anemona.

translation.en: So what?
Shit happens.
Just text her you're sleeping at my place and tomorrow you'll go home
translation.es: Dile que dormiste en mi casa y mañana te vas,

translation.en: and we'll never speak of this again.
Why do you have this in your room?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tienes esto en tu cuarto?

translation.en: I have that so you can spank me later.
translation.es: Lo tengo para que me des nalgadas luego.

translation.en: But I have to tell her. It's only fair.
translation.es: Pero tengo que decírselo. Es lo justo.

translation.en: I was in your shoes a long time ago and I chose honesty.
translation.es: Estuve en tu situación hace mucho y decidí ser sincero.

translation.en: Do you wanna know what happened?
She killed my hamster.
She cooked it and fed it to me.
translation.es: Lo cocinó y me lo dio de comer.

translation.en: Jesus!
Alin!
Anemona!
Anemona?
Well, boo- fucking- hoo!
What kind of a comedy doesn't have a happy ending?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de comedia no tiene final feliz?

translation.en: Anemona? Is that you?
No, it's not Anemona, you dumb- ass!
Look at you, crying like a little girl.
Oh, Anemona, where are you? Please don't leave me!
translation.es: Oh, Anemona, ¿dónde estás? Por favor, no me dejes.

translation.en: I don't know who you are, I don't know what you want...
translation.es: No sé quién eres. No sé qué quieres,

translation.en: But if you don't tell me, I will look for you,
translation.es: pero si no me lo dices, te buscaré,

translation.en: I will find you and I will kill you!
The speech from Taken? Seriously?
How ridiculously stupid!
Holy shit!
Hey, watch your mouth in the presence of... the Almighty!
translation.es: - Mierda. - Cuida tu boca en presencia del Todopoderoso.

translation.en: You disgusting sinner!
Let's try this!
How did you do that?
If I'm God, I guess you must be Jesus.
translation.es: Si soy Dios, supongo que debes ser Jesús.

translation.en: You know, you can walk on water. Come on, try it!
translation.es: Puedes caminar sobre el agua. Vamos, inténtalo.

translation.en: - What a dumb motherfucker! - Who the hell are you?
You haven't figured it out by now? I'm future you, buddy.
translation.es: ¿Todavía no te diste cuenta? Soy tú en el futuro, amigo.

translation.en: If you are me, then fuck you!
translation.es: Si eres yo, ¡vete a la mierda!

translation.en: I mean... fuck me! Whatever!
translation.es: Me voy a la mierda. Lo que sea.

translation.en: Wait!
- You can take me wherever I want? - Where do you wanna go?
So... You gonna hook up with her?
You know what?
Fuck you, dude!
You do know you could've just gone back to last night
translation.es: Sabes que pudiste haber vuelto a anoche y rechazar a Ramona,
